mapper.select: SELECT id, asset_number AS assetNumber, name, type_id AS typeId, asset_type AS assetType, tower_id AS towerId, tower_name AS towerName, tower_address AS towerAddress, specification, manufacturer_name AS manufacturerName, contact_phone AS contactPhone, production_time AS productionTime, position, asset_url AS assetUrl, maintenance_time AS maintenanceTime, maintenance_period AS maintenancePeriod FROM tb_asset_maintain_manage WHERE id = #{id}
